title: 太妙玄禁 · 雷火试阵

scenes.description: 片头卷轴翻开，字幕“上一回 · 血虹争锋”，背景为草原暮色与裂开的黄土荒地。

visual.composition: Golden scroll unfurling above prairie at dusk with dust storm remnants
visual.environment: Prairie horizon blended with yellow wasteland

scenes.prompt: xianxia title card, golden scroll over prairie dusk and dusty wasteland, cinematic lighting
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，第174集《太妙玄禁》开篇随诸位同行。

scenes.description: 韩立握着被冰封的穆姓法士躯体，灵气震荡将尸身震碎成寒霜光屑。

visual.composition: Han Li holding frozen body as icy shards scatter

scenes.prompt: cultivator shattering frozen foe in mid-air, blue ice shards scattering, cool lighting
scenes.narration: 韩立毁尸收袋，将寒霜余辉驱散于风中，以免留下任何痕迹。

scenes.description: 韩立展开淡银色储物袋，神识一扫仅见零散灵石和俗丹。

visual.composition: Open pouch with a few spirit stones and bottles
visual.environment: Floating mid-air with blurred prairie backdrop
visual.character_pose: Hands holding pouch, brow slightly furrowed

scenes.prompt: close-up of cultivator inspecting small stash of spirit stones and pills, disappointed mood
scenes.narration: 他神识扫遍储袋，只见灵石寥寥，丹瓶寻常，难免失落叹息。

scenes.description: 韩立抬手招来黑色巨峰，宝物缩成掌心大小刻有“千重峰”。

visual.composition: Miniature black mountain resting on palm with golden inscription

scenes.prompt: close shot of cultivator holding miniature black mountain artifact with gold inscription, intrigued expression
scenes.narration: 他招手摄来千重峰，黑光收缩落入掌中，巴掌大小的小山沉甸在握。

scenes.description: 骨白御风车缩成光球被收入袖中，符纹黯淡。

visual.composition: Bone chariot miniaturizing into glowing orb before sleeve

scenes.prompt: bone wind chariot shrinking into glowing orb as cultivator collects it into sleeve
scenes.narration: 御风车化光收于袖中，骨翼符纹皆被他收入囊中，留待后用。

scenes.description: 韩立目送元婴远遁的方向，转身化作青虹离开尘幕。

visual.composition: Azure streak launching southward above prairie edge
visual.environment: Clear sky with residual dust clouds

scenes.prompt: cultivator transforms into azure streak departing dusty battlefield toward prairie
scenes.narration: 他望元婴逃去方向略作思索，旋即改道化青虹离去。

scenes.description: 山丘上方青光盘旋，韩立降落在南陇侯设下的隐形禁制前。

visual.composition: Hilltop with faint translucent barrier shimmer
visual.character_pose: Han Li descending with light aura

scenes.prompt: cultivator descending onto secluded hilltop with faint barrier shimmer, calm mood
scenes.narration: 他依约抵达山丘上空，青光盘旋后落入禁制屏障之前静候。

scenes.description: 众人围坐商议同伴动向，顺带谈及慕兰与九国盟再战的可能。

visual.composition: Cultivators seated in circle atop hill with prairie background

scenes.prompt: group of cultivators discussing on hilltop, prairie background, thoughtful mood
scenes.narration: 众人言笑间谈及同伴去向，也对慕兰再战表示忧虑。

scenes.description: 黝黑汉子推测慕兰得到援军，猜测对方为何主动挑起冲突。

visual.composition: Black-faced cultivator speaking with furrowed brow

scenes.prompt: close shot of cultivator speculating, suspicious expression, windy prairie setting
scenes.narration: 黑脸汉子猜测慕兰得新援，质疑对方为何执意挑起战火。

scenes.description: 三道光华自远空坠落，王天古带着王蝉与燕如嫣从黑雾中步出。

visual.composition: Three cultivators landing with black aura swirl
visual.character_pose: Leader in front, two juniors behind

scenes.prompt: three cultivators descend onto hilltop with dark aura trailing, neutral tone
scenes.narration: 三道光华落下，王天古携二女现身山丘，神色从容。

scenes.description: 韩立与王天古寒暄，言语暗提王蝉旧事，双方面色沉浮。

visual.composition: Two cultivators facing each other with juniors in background

scenes.prompt: two cultivators exchanging polite yet tense words on windy hilltop, subtle expressions
scenes.narration: 韩立淡笑回礼，话语藏锋提及王婵旧事，令对方神色一滞略显尴尬。

scenes.description: 突然空中灵光翻腾，众人抬首察觉新的遁光逼近。

visual.composition: Cultivators looking upward as sky ripples

scenes.prompt: group of cultivators looking up as new light streak approaches, alert mood
scenes.narration: 众人忽觉天际灵光翻涌，纷纷抬首戒备陌生气息。

scenes.description: 尤姓修士被两道霞光紧追，落下后连声道谢仍显疲态。

visual.composition: White-robed cultivator breathing heavily while bowing
visual.character_pose: One hand on chest, other cupped

scenes.prompt: cultivator landing exhausted, offering thanks while two light streaks loom behind
scenes.narration: 尤姓修士白虹狼狈坠落，感谢众人接应仍掩不住疲惫神色。

scenes.description: 八名修士同时升空结阵，在尤姓修士面前形成弧形防线。

visual.composition: Arc of floating cultivators emitting various colored auras

scenes.prompt: eight cultivators forming arc formation mid-air with colorful auras, defensive stance
scenes.narration: 八位修士化光升空迎敌，阵线舒展开形成弧形防守稳固。

scenes.description: 红绿两道霞光停在远处，麻冠和绿袍法士冷冷观望。

visual.composition: Two distant figures wreathed in colored light hovering

scenes.prompt: telephoto view of two robed figures hovering in red and green light, tense standoff
scenes.narration: 前方红绿霞光停驻，麻冠与绿袍法士遥遥对峙，气定神闲不退。

scenes.description: 双方在空中隔空交锋，慕兰法士放言要拖住他们半日。

visual.composition: Two groups facing each other across distance

scenes.prompt: two airborne groups exchanging shouts across distance, tense confrontation
scenes.narration: 双方言辞交锋，南陇侯警告对面，但仍被对方奚落，扬言要拖住半日。

scenes.description: 一道火色传音符掠至麻冠法士手中，符火爆裂传来急讯。

visual.composition: Fire talisman hovering above palm flaring

scenes.prompt: close shot of fiery talisman exploding into message over cultivator's palm
scenes.narration: 红色传音符飞至麻冠掌心，火焰开裂带来惊悚讯息，令其变色。

scenes.description: 两名法士互传神识，狠狠盯向韩立后化虹回撤。

visual.composition: Two streaks of light turning away rapidly

scenes.prompt: two colored light streaks turning and speeding away after glaring, suspicious mood
scenes.narration: 两名法士互传神识后狠狠盯向韩立，旋即化虹匆匆退走。

scenes.description: 王天古似笑非笑询问韩立可曾识得二人，暗藏试探。

visual.composition: Cultivator leaning slightly toward Han Li, inquisitive eyes

scenes.prompt: cultivator casually questioning another with sly smile, grassy hill background
scenes.narration: 王天古装作随意询问韩立是否识得二人，言语暗藏探试。

scenes.description: 南陇侯打断闲话，催促众人赶赴苍坤遗地破禁取宝。

visual.composition: Leader gesturing toward horizon

scenes.prompt: cultivation leader rallying group on prairie, pointing forward with determination
scenes.narration: 南陇侯不纠缠旧事，催促众人尽快赴约破禁，以免迟滞更多。

scenes.description: 沿草原边缘飞行，众人望见一座灰白秃山孤立无草。

visual.composition: Small barren mountain amid green plains

scenes.prompt: aerial shot of barren gray hill rising from green prairie as cultivators approach
scenes.narration: 沿草原西行，一座灰白秃山突兀而立，毫无灵气波动，令人疑惑。

scenes.description: 南陇侯与白衫老者掷出绿黄秘旗，法阵光丝渗入山体。

visual.composition: Two cultivators casting glowing flags into rocky slope
visual.fx: Green and yellow runes sinking into stone

scenes.prompt: two cultivators casting glowing flags into barren hill to activate mechanism
scenes.narration: 南陇侯与白衫老者同掷秘旗，咒语交织令旗影没入石壁。

scenes.description: 大地震颤，石山自上而下裂开，白光中显出幽深阶梯。

visual.composition: Mountain splitting with glowing fissure

scenes.prompt: dramatic shot of barren mountain splitting open to reveal glowing staircase
scenes.narration: 大地震颤间石山劈开，柔白裂缝显出通往地下的阶梯，幽深。

scenes.description: 众人鱼贯踏入石阶，南陇侯与白衫老者走在最前领路。

visual.composition: Line of cultivators descending staircase lit by moonstones

scenes.prompt: line of cultivators descending glowing stone staircase into mountain interior
scenes.narration: 众人鱼贯踏入石阶，南陇侯与白衫老者当先领路，沉稳谨慎。

scenes.description: 越往下越寒，月光石变成幽绿色，众人自动与前者拉开距离。

visual.composition: Narrow corridor with green lighting, shadows stretching
visual.environment: Stone walls lined with luminescent tiles

scenes.prompt: cultivators cautiously descending corridor lit by eerie green stones, spaced out
scenes.narration: 阶梯越走越寒，月光石转幽绿，众人下意识拉开距离，保持警觉。

scenes.description: 地下巨厅闪耀蓝翠光泽，晶壁硬如翡翠反弹众人神识。

visual.composition: Large jade-like hall with glowing walls

scenes.prompt: vast underground hall with jade-like walls glowing blue-green, cultivators observing
scenes.narration: 百丈深处现出蓝翠巨厅，晶壁反弹神识令众人惊讶连连。

scenes.description: 入口闭合成蓝墙，南陇侯解释外层禁制自动封合不可久留。

visual.composition: Leader addressing group with sealed wall behind

scenes.prompt: leader explaining to group inside glowing crystal hall after entrance seals shut
scenes.narration: 通道忽然闭合，石厅被封，南陇侯解释外层禁制自动封合，无需惊慌。

scenes.description: 邰夫人提出动用雷火锥破阵，要求若成功可提前择宝。

visual.composition: Elderly woman holding glowing flame-etched cone
visual.fx: Red and white sparks from treasure

scenes.prompt: elder female cultivator presenting a fiery cone artifact while negotiating
scenes.narration: 邰夫人提出以雷火锥试阵，条件是若成可提前挑宝一次。

scenes.description: 雷火锥化虹撞向晶墙，火浪雷弧散尽却连痕迹都未留下。

visual.composition: Red-white cone striking glowing wall
visual.environment: Crystal wall with flames washing over
visual.fx: Flames and lightning spreading across surface

scenes.prompt: fiery lightning drill impacting crystal wall, flames dispersing without effect
scenes.narration: 她先以试探之击轰向晶墙，火浪雷弧散去，却未留下任何痕迹。

scenes.description: 雷火锥被全力催动钻入墙内，却被白色光丝缠断化作齑粉。

visual.composition: Glowing white filaments wrapping around burning drill

scenes.prompt: white energy threads inside crystal wall constricting and shattering fiery drill artifact
scenes.narration: 雷火锥全力旋入晶壁，白丝忽现缠断宝物令邰夫人吐血欲坠。

scenes.description: 众人面露骇色时，韩立主动上前自荐尝试破解太妙神禁。

visual.composition: Han Li stepping from crowd toward crystal wall

scenes.prompt: cultivator stepping forward confidently toward glowing wall while others watch
scenes.narration: 众人犹豫之际，韩立自荐试破太妙神禁，目露淡淡自信光芒。

scenes.description: 片尾画面定格在韩立步向晶墙的背影，蓝光流转。

visual.composition: Back view of Han Li approaching crystal wall with light trails

scenes.prompt: rear view of cultivator walking toward glowing crystal wall, blue light pulsing, cliffhanger tone
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，下集看韩立阵破太妙神禁，揭开苍坤秘境。喜欢的话请点赞支持一下！下集再见。
